gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... disport 玩耍，嬉戏 disquisition 长篇演讲，专题论文 dissection 解剖，剖析.

list.abs: Ji said he has a' bad' habit of doing multi works at one time , he used to do a translation project while writing an academic disquisition .他习惯在写作一篇学术论文的同时去做一个翻译项目。季羡林说自己有一个“坏”习惯，喜欢同时做多项工作。
don't be jealous . he take all the month to write that disquisition . he would got the award .别那么眼红了。他花了整整一个月的时间才写出那篇论文。他该拿这个奖。
the primary articles and disquisitions of english ., 发表文章之英文简介.
a disquisition on subjectivity of literature文学的主体性问题研究

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: via French from Latin disquisitio(n-) 'investigation', based on quaerere 'seek'. The original sense was 'topic for investigation', whence 'discourse in which a subject is investigated' (mid 17th cent.)

entry.def: A disquisition is a detailed explanation of a particular subject.

example.ex: Amanda launched into an authoritative disquisition about contracts.
example.tran: 阿曼达就合约给出了权威性的阐述。

means.word_mean: 1. an elaborate analytical or explanatory essay or discussion

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想获得的,有获得可能性的,可学到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac不断+quis寻求,询问+itive……的→不断寻求的→想获得的
re再+quis寻求,询问+ite……的→一再寻求的→需要的
dis分开+quis寻求,询问+ition表名词→分开询问→到处问→探究
in进入+quis寻求,询问+ition表名词→问进去→调查,探究
re再+quis寻求,询问+ite……的→一再寻求的→需要的
quiz=quis寻求,询问→n.&v.测验, 提问
in进入+quis寻求,询问+ite表动词→问进去→调查,探究
